meanings.definition: A knitted fabric made of wool or cotton.
meanings.sent1: I wore a cozy tricot sweater on a chilly day.
meanings.sent2: The tricot material of the scarf felt soft against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The tricot blanket kept me warm like a hug from a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her tricot dress was a woven masterpiece of comfort and style.
meanings.sent5: The tricot fabric was like a gentle embrace, wrapping me in warmth.

meanings.definition: A garment made from tricot fabric.
meanings.sent1: She looked elegant in her flowing tricot gown.
meanings.sent2: The tricot swimsuit dried quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent3: He pretended his tricot shirt was a superhero cape, ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The tricot outfit was her armor, empowering her to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The tricot garment shimmered in the light, catching everyone's eye.
